user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me an update about how the wellness program is going and to check his Notion for information. Have him email me at angela.richardson@zenithglobal.com.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Could you please send me an update on how the wellness program is progressing? When you prepare the update, kindly check your Notion workspace for any relevant information or recent notes. 

Please email the update to me at angela.richardson@zenithglobal.com.

Thank you!

Best,  
Angela

final_output:
